Проверка на невозможность редактирования содержимого input

| script |
| do | verifyNotEditable | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div/div/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[12]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input-! |

Проверка поля с ASCII символами

| script |
| ensure | do | type | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[13]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input-! | with | Какой-то текст |
| ensure | do | waitForVisible | on | text=errors* |
| ensure | do | type | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[13]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input-! | with | Some text |
| ensure | do | waitForNotVisible | on | text=errors* |
| ensure | do | waitForVisible | on | text=Поясняющий текст* |

Проверка поля с вводом пароля

| script |
| ensure | do | type | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[14]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input-! | with | Пароль |
| ensure | do | waitForVisible | on | text=errors* |
| ensure | do | type | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[14]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input-! | with | password |
| ensure | do | waitForNotVisible | on | text=errors* |
| $type= | is | storeAttribute | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[14]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input@type-! |
| ensure | do | verifyEval | on | "$type" | with | password |
| ensure | do | click | on | text=show-password |
| $type= | is | storeAttribute | on | !-//*[@id="ndm-page-view"]/div[1]/div[1]/div/div/div[2]/div/form/div[14]/div/div[2]/label[1]/input@type-! |
| ensure | do | verifyEval | on | "$type" | with | text |
